text: The AC_MSG_CHECKING() added in r671955 has no AC_MSG_RESULT(). That breaks the output of configure (no "yes" or "no" after "Checking ...", and instead two "Checking ..." lines concatenated.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
Created attachment 23044
Add AC_MSG_RESULT() after AC_MSG_CHECKING() (addition to r671955)

creator: bojan@rexursive.com
text: Committed to trunk, 1.4.x and 1.3.x. Thanks for the patch!
